title: I have a pimple in my ear and it's blocking 90% of my hearing from it
body:
It's deep in the canal and it's driving me FUCKING INSANE.

I've used about 6 q-tips, and even dipped some in Hydrogen Peroxide to clear out any wax or residue that might be making it worse, but it didn't help. Basically the pimple's too big and blocking my hearing, it feels like I have a foreign object in my ear that I can't get out.

There's nothing that frustrates me more than not being able to hear, because 1. it affects my ability to play games and 2. it affects my ability to listen to and play music.

For fucks sake I want to just pull a Van Gogh at this point.
